text:
CHUCK SCHUMER: The
rich get $592 billion

in tax cuts for the richest,
compared to only $361 billion

for the middle class
and the working class
to afford health care.

So when Speaker Ryan says
it's an act of mercy,

yeah, for those people
who make over $250,000

a year, because they
get big tax cuts.

The only winners
in this CBO report

are the health
insurance executives
and the wealthy Americans.

Everyone else gets
a cold shoulder

from the Republicans in Congress
and from President Trump.

Now, you remember when
President Trump was a candidate?

He said everyone will be
covered and costs will go down.

We now know that
he had no intention
of keeping either promise.

Today, the nonpartisan
scorekeepers
have spoken clearly.

Trumpcare means higher
costs for less coverage.

The CBO report should
be a knockout blow
for Republicans in Congress.

They should heed
this warning and turn

back from their plan that would
be a disaster for the country.
